Class AbstractMarkerLanguageParser

  • java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • parseRange

        public static def parseRange(stringRange : String,
                             minValue : int) : org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.IntegerRange 
        Description copied from class: AbstractMarkerLanguageParser
        Parse a range of integers.

        The supported formats are:

        • n for exactly n,
        • n-m for n to m,
        • n- for n to infinity,
        • -m for 1 to n.
        Parameters:
        stringRange - the string representation to parse.
        minValue - the minimal value in the possible values for the range.
        Returns:
        the integer range.
